member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException
member.summary: Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.
member.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException
member.summary: Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has serialized data.
member.param: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown..
The contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags
member.summary: Represents information about C# dynamic operations that are not specific to particular arguments at a call site. Instances of this class are generated by the C# compiler.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.BinaryOperationLogical
member.summary: The binder represents a logical AND or logical OR that is part of a conditional logical operator evaluation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.CheckedContext
member.summary: The evaluation of this binder happens in a checked context.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.ConvertArrayIndex
member.summary: The binder represents an implicit conversion for use in an array creation expression.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.ConvertExplicit
member.summary: The binder represents an explicit conversion.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.InvokeSimpleName
member.summary: The binder represents an invoke on a simple name.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.InvokeSpecialName
member.summary: The binder represents an invoke on a specialname.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.None
member.summary: There is no additional information required for this binder.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.ResultDiscarded
member.summary: The binder is used in a position that does not require a result, and can therefore bind to a void returning method.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.ResultIndexed
member.summary: The result of any bind is going to be indexed get a set index or get index binder.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags.ValueFromCompoundAssignment
member.summary: The value in this set index or set member comes a compound assignment operator.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags
member.summary: Represents information about C# dynamic operations that are specific to particular arguments at a call site. Instances of this class are generated by the C# compiler.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.Constant
member.summary: The argument is a constant.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.IsOut
member.summary: The argument is passed to an out parameter.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.IsRef
member.summary: The argument is passed to a ref parameter.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.IsStaticType
member.summary: The argument is a indicating an actual type name used in source. Used only for target objects in static calls.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.NamedArgument
member.summary: The argument is a named argument.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.None
member.summary: No additional information to represent.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags.UseCompileTimeType
member.summary: The argument's compile-time type should be considered during binding.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo
member.summary: Represents information about C# dynamic operations that are specific to particular arguments at a call site. Instances of this class are generated by the C# compiler.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo.Create(Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfoFlags,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The flags for the argument.
The name of the argument, if named; otherwise null.
member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.Binder
member.summary: Contains factory methods to create dynamic call site binders for CSharp.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.Binder.BinaryOperation(Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags,System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType,System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo})
member.summary: Initializes a new CSharp binary operation binder.
member.param: The flags with which to initialize the binder.
The binary operation kind.
The that indicates where this operation is used.
The sequence of instances for the arguments to this operation.
member.returns: Returns a new CSharp binary operation binder.

member.summary: Initializes a new CSharp convert binder.
member.param: The flags with which to initialize the binder.
The type to convert to.
The that indicates where this operation is used.
member.returns: Returns a new CSharp convert binder.

The sequence of instances for the arguments to this operation.
